title: Twin City Crossroads
description: After the events of Dinosauria-Part I: Garden, Jack Pennywise and his fellow time travellers find themselves trapped in the twin cities of Elysium and Dis, high above the Blastlands of Dinosauria, captives of the grotesque Saurians-a race descended from the dinosaurs. What do the Saurians want? What will become of them? And what, exactly, did they want with Andrea?Look for Part III in March
author: J. Rock
